openconnector
Class Request

java.lang.Object
  openconnector.Request

public class Request
extends java.lang.Object

A model to represent a request for a single target object. A list of these is found within a Plan object.

Usually the target is a user account, but it could be a group or some other object managed by this connector.

Nested Class Summary
static class Request.Operation
          Operations specify what is to be done to the object.

setResource

public void setResource(java.lang.String res)
Set the name of the resource owning the object. This is set only for proxy connectors that can handle requests for several resources. For simple connectors it will be null.

add

getSchemaItems

public java.util.List<Item> getSchemaItems()
Returns:
a list containing only those Items that are for attributes defined in the object schema.

This is a convenience for connectors that do not process items one at a time and instead just like to convert them all to a Map and pass them along.

getSystemItems

public java.util.List<Item> getSystemItems()
Returns:
a list containing only those Items that are for system properties like Connector.ATT_DISABLED.
